overview: A huge stranded animal traversing history. A large expanded lung struggling to breathe. A survivor of vandalism and looting. Transformed into a photographic attraction for tourists with no memory. There it remains, twitching in its stony bed. Warden of legends, haven of the fairies. The enchanted forest. The forest that breathes. The primary forest.
title: DURMIENTES (le battement de la forêt)
